MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G14 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.55pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at Vancouver Drive and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27pm on Wednesday, 30 December 2020
